SELECT COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX ,COMPANY_ID ,COMPANY_NAME ,RECRUIT_TITLE ,COMPANY_JOB ,GETMAN ,REGION_IDX ,COMPANY_ADDRESS ,COMPANY_INFO ,APPLICATION_DEADLINE ,COMPANY_ESTABLISH ,COMPANY_RECRUIT_REGDATE ,VIEWS FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{company_id}
SELECT * FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT CR JOIN COMMON_COMPANY_RECRUIT_SKILL CCRS ON CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = CCRS.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX WHERE CR.COMPANY_RECRUIT_IDX = #{company_recruit_idx}
